bibl.title: Ostraca from the Egyptian Stone Quarries.
bibl.note: Article compte rendu de: Jean BINGEN, Adam BÜLOW-JACOBSEN, Walter E.H. COCKLE, Hélène CUVIGNY, François KAYSER et Wilfried VAN RENGEN, Mons Claudianus. Ostraca Graeca et Latina. II (O. Claud. 191 à 416) = Documents de fouilles. 32 (Le Caire, 1997).
bibl.seg: BAGNALL Roger S., Ostraca from the Egyptian Stone Quarries.
